word: H. H. HAYNES: HERE IS A QUESTION THAT HAS BEEN ASKED ME BY A GREAT MANY OF OUR PEOPLE WITHIN THE LAST YEAR. THEY SAY, "WE COULD OPEN A HEALTH BOARDING HOUSE; BUT WOULD IT BE RIGHT TO DO THIS AND SERVE GUESTS ON THE SABBATH, AND HAVE THEM AROUND ON THAT DAY AS WE SHOULD IN AN ORDINARY BOARDING-HOUSE?"
